short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Radio Srood chrome extension simply lets you listen to Afghan music from your Google Chrome toolbar

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Listen to Radio Srood while your surfing the web, by one click you can easily listen to Afghan music at any time very convenient from your chrome toolbar.

About Radio Srood:

Radio Srood app is an internet radio station streaming live Afghan music 24/7 with high quality music on your phone. Download our free iOS and Android app from App Stores and enjoy listening to Afghan music wherever you go in the world. We have variety of music such as Farsi, Pashto, Pamir or Pamiri, Shughni, Uzbek, Tajik, Balochi, Persian, Dari and Pashie.

We hope you enjoy our Chrome extension and please kindly give us a 5 start rating. If you have suggestions or in case you had any difficulty using our Chrome extension please contact us at app@pamirtech.com 

Follow us on Facebook, Instgram, Twitter and Snapchat #RadioSrood

Thank you | Tashakor | Manana | Qulogh,

Radio Srood Team.
